resources.string:
Hi, my name is Danilo. 

I love to learn new technologies 

Sometimes I just start learning things that I don't know if I gonna use, but is fun to understand how things work, even if you not gonna use it. 

This might be a problem because learn takes times, and sometimes I fell like I should be using this time to learn something useful to my stack, but this is something that I should improve in my career.
